TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现滚动条控件使用的操作系统当前视觉样式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a scroll bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制的滚动条，请使用此类中方法的组合来呈现滚动条的每个部分。To draw a scroll bar, use a combination of the methods in this class to render each part of the scroll bar. 如果视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区在操作系统中启用了可视样式，此类方法将绘制当前视觉样式的滚动条。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the scroll bar with the current visual style. 否则，此类方法将引发。Otherwise, the methods of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的滚动条。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a scroll bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法在自定义控件的方法，以便在鼠标指针的位置确定的状态中绘制滚动箭头。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a scroll arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]
